domain

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    the Board class represents a single battleship game board. The board keeps track of the condition of each slot as well as any placed ships
    Author:
    rverbist
    See Also:
    MapSlot, PlacedShip, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int dimension)
      creates a new battleship game board of the given dimension

      • addShip

        public boolean addShip(Ship ship,
              Location location)
        adds a Ship to this board on the specified location
        Parameters:
        ship - a Ship instance
        location - the Location on which to place the ship
        Returns:
        true if the Ship is added, false otherwise
        Throws:
        {@link - LocationOutOfBounds} if the specified Location is outside of the bounds of the board
        {@link - LocationAlreadyTaken} if the specified Location is already taken by another ship

      • removeShip

        public boolean removeShip(PlacedShip ship)
        removes a PlacedShip from this board
        Parameters:
        ship - a PlacedShip instance
        Returns:
        true if the PlacedShip is removed, false other wise

        public MapSlot fire(Location location)
        fires a missile at the given Location and returns the new MapSlot status
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the status at the given Location
        Throws:
        {@link - LocationOutOfBounds} if the specified location is out of bounds
